# resume()

**Instance Method**

Begins or resumes a machine learning task.

## Declaration

```swift
func resume()
```

## Discussion

Use this method to start a task for the first time or resumes a task that has paused. Tasks pause when they notify your app’s progress handlers, such as those you provide to an [doc://com.apple.coreml/documentation/CoreML/MLUpdateProgressHandlers] instance.

## Starting and stopping a task

- **cancel()**: Cancels a machine learning task before it completes.
